item.title: Joe Rogan and COVID-19 Deaths in Young, Healthy Individuals
item.description: Intro With doctors calling on Spotify to stop Joe Rogan Experience misinformation, I wanted to see what his remarks were and what the risk really was. Summary Rogan said he did not think young and healthy individuals (specifically a 21 year old) needed to get vaccinated. A rough point estimate of total deaths for individuals aged 0-24, without pre-existing conditions, in England and Wales during March to June 2020 is 15.
